mapper.hql: from Resource where parent.id=${parentId} and parent.id != id
from Resource where parent.id = id order by orderIndex
mapper.sql: select distinct t.id, t.name, t.description, t.url, t.type, t.status, t.code, t.configuration, t.module_name, t.gmt_create, t.gmt_modified, t.create_by, t.last_modified_by, t.order_index, t.parent_id from resource_info t inner join role_resource rr on t.id = rr.resource_id inner join user_role ur on rr.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = ${userId} <#if type == '1'> and t.type=1 <#else> and t.type=0 </#if> and t.type = ${type} and t.status = ${status} start with t.code = '${code}' connect by nocycle prior t.id = t.parent_id
